alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 4:09AM EDT until August 03 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Queens and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. ROCKAWAY INLET NY NEAR FLOYD BENNETT FIELD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.3 FT, MODERATE 8.3 FT, MAJOR 9.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/09 AM 6.2/ 6.8 0.7/ 1.1 0.7/ 1.1 1 NONE 02/09 PM 7.4/ 7.9 1.8/ 2.2 0.6/ 1.1 1 MINOR 03/10 AM 6.5/ 7.0 0.9/ 1.4 0.7/ 1.1 1-2 NONE 03/10 PM 7.4/ 7.9 1.8/ 2.2 0.7/ 1.1 2 MINOR JAMAICA BAY AT INWOOD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
